pages.text: $(br2)The Miocore Blaster is the only way to smelt our modded Ores into their Items, if you mine the Ores with $(l)$(4)silk-touch$().

You need a fuel item like our modded coal in the $(l)$(4)left-bottom-slot$(), sand in the $(l)$(4)top-slot$() in the middle and one of our ore in the $(l)$(4)bottom-slot$() in the middle. $(br2)The $(l)$(4)Output Slot$() is at the right side.
